SA11bsa035_u:5: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
SA11bsa035_u:7: ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ,
SA11bsa035_u:13: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
SA11bsa035_u:18: tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
SA11bsa035_u:21: triratnapratimāsamakṣaṃ sulipya sugandhapuṣpaprakaraṃ suvikīrya tadagrato bhūmau jānunī saṃsthāpya,
SA11bsa035_u:22: kṛtāñjaliḥ daśadiglokadhāta-samastabuddha-samastadharmamahāyānasaṃghasamakṣaṃ ca asaṃkhyānirvācyakāyavyūhān nirmāya teṣāñcaikaikam caraṇayoḥ supraṇamet /
SA11bsa035_u:24: tataḥ pratikāyaṃ anirvacanīyamukhāni pratimukhaṃ cānirvacanīyajihvā nirmāya,
SA11bsa035_u:27: aciram abhisambodhiprāptān buddhān bhagavato dharmacakrapravartanāya adhyeṣayet /
SA11bsa035_u:28: ye dharmacakraṃ pravartya āyuḥ saṃskārān parijihīrṣante, (tān)
SA11bsa035_u:31: yathā sūtre āgatāni tathā pratyaṅgapadāni savistaraṃ paṭhet /
SA11bsa035_u:32: tataḥ saptapūjānantaraṃ sarvasattvān avalambya triśaraṇagamanapadāni triḥ paṭhet /
SA11bsa035_u:33: tataḥ bodhicittamutpādayet, yathā vidhau prāpyate tathā ca kuryāt / antaśaśca evam-
SA11bsa035_u:39: tataḥ svakāyārpaṇaṃ, tataḥ mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ dharmanaye mahārathināṃ ca mārge avasthānāya pratijānīyāt /
SA11bsa035_u:43: tataḥ cakṣurunmīlya, niḥśvasya, bāhyābhyantaravastudarśane- 'aho! āścaryam, aho! āścaryam /
SA11bsa035_u:44: ākāśopamānutpādataḥ pratītyasamutpādabalena nānābhāseyamavasthitiḥ ayam' aho! āścaryam' iti vicintya aṣṭamāyopamarupeṇa jānīyāt /
SA11bsa035_u:45: tato mahākaruṇacittena samastādṛśyasattvebhyo dharmadeśanārtha yathābodhi mahāyāna-sūtrapāṭhaṃ kuryāt /
SA11bsa035_u:46: tataḥ bhojanāvasare- 'ṣaṭtriṃśadaśuciparipūrṇena asāreṇa nāśaparyavasitena kāyenānena tadbuddhadharmakāya-sāramanveṣayāmi' iti vicintya na puṣṭyartha,
SA11bsa035_u:59: tataḥ pūrvāhṇayāmeṣvapi pañcamaprahare yathoktavat sarvaṃ kāryam /
SA11bsa035_u:60: madhyāhne sandhyāyāṃ rātreḥ prathame madhye ca yāme sarvathā yathoktāḥ sarve vidhayaḥ pūrayitavyāḥ /
SA11bsa035_u:65: yadi durvāsanābalād āpattirbhavet, evaṃ śīghram pratikuryāt /
SA11bsa035_u:66: evaṃ teṣāṃ ṣaḍyāmānām aṣṭādaśadhā vibhāge kṛte sati catuḥpañcāśatkṣaṇā bhaviṣyanti /
SA11bsa035_u:67: bodhisattvā api uttamamadhyamā ('dhamāḥ) nava syuḥ / gurupadeśataḥ
SA11bsa035_u:69: śreṣṭhaiḥ samākhyātatamaṃ sumārga bodhiprabhādyaiḥ kalitaśca śiṣyaiḥ /
SA11bsa035_u:70: gattvā mahāyānakulābhijātaiḥ prāpyaṃ padaṃ tad dvipadendrakasya // 4 //
SA11bsa035_u:74: tenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā ca jayaśīlena anūditā //
